author: Andreas
content: Hehe, the big advantage is, I don't have to make it for a living, I don't sell, and therefore I just do as I like. If it does not work, what ever "working" means, I guess I'll have to write about that, well, if it does not work, I do something different the other day. It's exploring, and in fact, I have no idea where I go or where I even want to end up ðŸ™‚
